General.Name: North Eastern Carrying Corporation Limited
General.Description: North Eastern Carrying Corporation Limited provides transportation, freight management, and logistics solutions. The company offers small parcels, as well as full truck load, bulk movements, over dimensional consignments, and containerized movement of cargos. It also offers containerized movement of cargo, warehousing, and third party logistics, and storage facilities, as well as supply chain solutions. The company operates through a network of approximately 187 branches in India, Nepal, Bhutan, and Bangladesh. North Eastern Carrying Corporation Limited was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Delhi, India.

5.Name: Mr. Vinod R. Nair
